did.unittitle: Vollinger, William. Now Shall My Head Be Lifted Up Above My Enemies (Danny Velasco's Testimony)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 DVD, 1 Biographical Note. Notes: There is no paper score included, only a recording. This piece was also submitted for consideration in a previous festival in 2007 in a different format as a paper score. It was decided to house the submissions seperately as they are in different formats and were submitted for consideration in two different festival years. Received in Original Box 5. .
